price: 4. Cidina kama dooddo Aayadaha Alle aan ahayn kuwa gaalooba. Ee yeysan ku hodin gadgaddoonkooda iyo galoobaxooda magaalooyinka.
arabic: مَا يُجَٰدِلُ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ فَلَا يَغۡرُرۡكَ تَقَلُّبُهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡبِلَٰدِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: mā yujādilu fī āyāti al-lahi illā alladhīna kafarū falā yaghrur'ka taqallubuhum fī al-bilādi
